resources.string: Vietnamese astrology was created to let you get a hold of your destiny by using specific identification items such as your name, gender, date and time of birth to foresee parts of your future. Want to know more details about your future rather than common horoscope that you can find anywhere? Start reading now to get your prediction!
You must enter your name for the correct prediction.
You must choose your gender for the correct prediction
You must choose your date of birth for the correct prediction
You must choose your time of birth for the correct prediction
You must choose your place of birth for the correct prediction
Enter your correct details so we can predict your future.
Note : If you were born on exactly 19h then you belong to the Dog hour instead of the Chicken.
Your year of birth belongs to

Men born on the year of the horse or the goat with the "Menh" sign situated on the Mouse or Buffalo sign \: There are a lot of difficulties in life you must face and there won\'t be much time you will be satisfied by the result. However if you can overcome the hard time then you will succeed.
You are respected and loved by other people.
You will lead a leisure life.
You are very smart and sharp. You face a lot of difficulties when young.
However there is the star of "Thien dia khong" on the same spot so you can live a long life.
You will have enough money for a normal style life.
You may not have a very good health. Be sure to have a healthy lifestyle.
You face lots of difficulties when young like a pure flower getting smashed by the wind.
Will get rich but you don\'t have a very good health.
You may not be rich but you will live a long life.
You will achieve what you want. You will live a long life full of happiness.
You are very smart and sharp. However be careful! You may not succeed very well. Don\'t let thing discouraged you so easily.
Even though your school path may not be long, you will still succeed in your career field.
Because your "Menh" sign has the star "Thien Dong", "Thien Luong" or "Pha Quan" on it, you may have some problems with your health.

Your "Menh" sign has the star of "Dia kiep" situated on it and your "than" has the star of "Dia khong", you are a smart and sharp person. However you will have more sad than happy moments. You need to have a strong mind to face your problems.
Your "Menh" sign doesn\'t have any big star situated on it. In this situation you will face lots of difficulties when you are young.

Your "Than" sign is in the same position with your "thien di", this means you will build your career far from home and it will be very successful. You are someone active who love to travel and move to new places. Because of that reason you are not family-oriented but instead a social person. You have a large social networking and you are someone who have communication and organization skills. You will be able to work on career field who need to travel a lot and meet people. Most people like you will get a taste of working life earlier than other people around your age. Have lots of opportunity to travel.
Since your "Thien di" sign has "tuan triet" star on it, you will not pass away in your hometown.

Your "Than" sign is situated in your "the thiep"(husband/wife) category and there is the star of "Thai am" on it so you will need lots of help from your husband/wife. You may also be someone who are scared of your husband/wife.
Your "Than" sign is situated in your "the thiep"(husband/wife) category and there is the star of "Tuan triet" on it. Be careful! You may face some difficulties with your marital life.

Your "Than" sign is situated on the same place as your "Tai Bach" category, this means you are a hardworking person who want to save lots of money. Your number one concern in life will be money, you work hard to earn money to feed yourself. You have fast management skill with money. You make money very fast but career for you is not an important factor as long as you can earn money you will work on whatever field.
You will earn fame before money.
You get rich by making business.
You should try to avoid career in the maritime field as you may have some accidents with working on water.
Your "Than" and "Quan Loc" signs are together, this means you have a clear goal when you are/were studying on what career you are going to choose. You will be faithful to that career until the end.

"Than" and "Phu The" categories are together so you have some interesting things happening in your love life. You and your love met/will meet under a very special circumstance, you will feel like you have known him/her for long time already, you and your love have a strong bond and mostly it happens that you will work on the same field/area. Also, you may have a left-hand job. At first you may just do it for pure pleasure but in the long run it will become a successful career in your life.

Your "Than" and "Menh" signs are in the same spot, you believe in destiny and you may easily give up when things get hard. Your life doesn\'t have much things going on. If you are born rich you will stay rich but you are born poor it will be very difficult to become rich.

"Than" and "Quan Loc" sign Your "Than" and "Quan Loc" signs are together which give a good combination. However you have the star "Tuan triet", "Hoa ky" or "Dia kiep" there also, if you are a man your career success will come slow.
"Than" and "Quan Loc" signs are together = good result. However you have "Tuan Triet" and "Sat Tinh" star on there also. If you are a girl you should protect yourself from being cheated by bad guys.

You have "Tang Mon" and "Bach Ho" star combined together, you may feel lonely, you may be slow on getting married or have troubles with your marital life but don\'t get discouraged so easily. There are other good things in life besides a steady relationship.

Your "than" sign is situated on "Phuc Duc" sign so you have a strong feeling for family and strong sense of belonging to your nation. You like to have a life with a big family and have strong bonds with all your family members close or far. Since you have a strong love for your birth country you will likely live there for the rest of your life.
